title: User Login to Duck Creek
description: User should be able to login to Duck Creek Policy system with valid credentials
acceptance_criteria: Successful login redirects to home page

title: Create New Policy
description: User should be able to create a new insurance policy with customer information
acceptance_criteria: Effective date cannot be in the past

title: Search Existing Policy
description: User should be able to search for existing policies by various criteria

title: Process Policy Endorsement
description: User should be able to create and process policy endorsements

title: Submit New Claim
description: User should be able to submit a new insurance claim
